sn47.15:1.2: Atha kho ayasma bahiyo yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma bahiyo bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn47.15:1.3: “sadhu me, bhante, bhagava sankhittena dhammam desetu, yamaham bhagavato dhammam sutva eko vupakattho appamatto atapi pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn47.15:1.4: “Tasmatiha tvam, bahiya, adimeva visodhehi kusalesu dhammesu.
sn47.15:1.7: Yato ca kho te, bahiya, silanca suvisuddham bhavissati, ditthi ca ujuka, tato tvam, bahiya, silam nissaya sile patitthaya cattaro satipatthane bhaveyyasi.
sn47.15:2.2: Idha tvam, bahiya, kaye kayanupassi viharahi atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam;
sn47.15:2.5: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharahi atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn47.15:2.6: Yato kho tvam, bahiya, silam nissaya sile patitthaya ime cattaro satipatthane evam bhavessasi, tato tuyham, bahiya, ya ratti va divaso va agamissati, vuddhiyeva patikankha kusalesu dhammesu, no parihani”ti.
sn47.15:3.1: Atha kho ayasma bahiyo bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva pakkami.
sn47.15:3.2: Atha kho ayasma bahiyo eko vupakattho appamatto atapi pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthaya kulaputta sammadeva agarasma anagariyam pabbajanti, tadanuttaram—brahmacariyapariyosanam dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja vihasi.
sn47.15:3.3: “Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya”ti abbhannasi.
sn47.15:3.4: Annataro ca panayasma bahiyo arahatam ahositi.
